title: DSA Level 8 â€” Heaps & Hashing Basics
intro: This level introduces heaps and basic hashing concepts.
points: Understand the idea of a binary heap and the heap property.
Know the difference between min-heap and max-heap.
Use heaps conceptually to support priority-based operations.
Get a basic idea of hash tables and hash functions.
See how hashing can give average O(1) insertion and search.
